item.title: New puppet-gluster features before Linuxcon
item.description: Hey there, I’ve done a bit of puppet-gluster hacking lately to try to squeeze some extra features and testing in before Linuxcon. Here’s a short list: SELinux fixes to keep Dan Walsh happy :) Ping and status checks before volume creation. Now puppet-gluster will be less noisy about failures or missing executions that are due to the necessary incremental nature of puppet-gluster runs. You'll need multiple puppet runs to get a complete setup, so don't let puppet complain part way through.
